description.black-white:
The user attacks the target with a
bursting flame. The bursting flame damages
Pokémon next to the target as well.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.shortEffect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
